channel.title: OpenAPI Functions on quobix
channel.description: Recent content in OpenAPI Functions on quobix

item.title: oasExample
item.description: oasExample will scan an OpenAPI specification looking for violations around examples. The function is used by the oas2-valid-schema-example and oas3-valid-schema-example Rules. View Function Source

item.title: oasOpId
item.description: oasOpId will scan an OpenAPI specification looking at each operation, and ensuring an operationId has been defined. The function is used by the operation-operationId Rule View Spectral Equivalent View Function Source

item.title: oasOpIdUnique
item.description: oasOpIdUnique will scan an OpenAPI specification looking at each operation, and ensuring that its operationId is unique within the specification The function is used by the operation-operationId-unique Rule View Function Source

item.title: oasOpParams
item.description: oasOpParams will scan an OpenAPI specification looking at each operation, checking unique and non-repeating parameters. The function is used by the operation-parameters Rule View Function Source

item.title: oasOpSingleTag
item.description: oasOpSingularTag will scan an OpenAPI specification looking at each operation, checking there is only a single tag defined per operation. The function is used by the operation-singular-tag Rule View Function Source

item.title: oasOpSuccessResponse
item.description: oasOpSuccessResponse will scan an OpenAPI specification looking at each operation, and ensuring at least one 2xx or 3xx HTTP responses has been defined. The function is used by the operation-success-response Rule View Function Source
